CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 32-34 For example , the large planar benzodithiophene ( BDT ) unit has emerged as an attractive building block for conjugated polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| large planar benzodithiophene (BDT) |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entity is "large planar benzodithiophene (BDT)". It is a specific type of unit used in conjugated polymers and has been highlighted as an attractive building block in the example provided.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| large planar benzodithiophene (BDT) |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entity is "large planar benzodithiophene (BDT)". The phrase "conjugated polymers" is not considered a material name as it is a general category of materials, not a specific material. Therefore, it has not been included in the table.

Therefore, I have included "large planar benzodithiophene (BDT) unit" as the valid "Property Name" entity.
